special_text:
[i]“The night is a time of great magic. Now we hold that power for all eternity.”[/i]
Exile the top three cards of each player’s library face-down. You may look at them at any time.
You may cast a card exiled with Swezi Steals the Moon with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost. If you don’t, draw a card.
